text:
I will be a
journalist like a reporter who goes on war to explain the reality in the world
conflicts. I have in my mind for the future a wish to enter in army and in my
point of view this activity like war reporter is a good association to that. I
learn some books from reporter like Alex Dupont who did in my opinion a
really good job to talk about massive events what changes the Mondial
population point of view in subjects like conflicts (for example the 11<sup>th</sup>
September 2001).
My enter in
this license is for me an opportunity but not concern exactly what I want to do
and I’m actually in reflexion for where and when I can go in a formation and
give to me a really chance to practice a day this activity.
I have ever
given a great admiration for people who have prestance and can mobilize people
with a discourse or just with some words. This art for communication has always
interested me and I have in my opinion little skills like that. I haven’t
really one source of inspiration who open my eyes and after what I said, it’s
really that what I want to do but it’s a process during the entire of my small
life where I have seen, talked, listened and every theses informations gives to
me an attirance to the communication world.
